price: هغه ورځ ده چې هيڅوک به د بل چا لپاره څه نه شي کولای او په هغه ورځ به امر يوازې الله لره وي.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā tamliku nafsun linafsin shayan wal-amru yawma-idhin lillahi
